scripts.install-packages: npm install && cd implementations/typescript && npm install && cd ../.. && cmake-js install -d 'implementations/cpp'
scripts.build: cd implementations/typescript && npx tsc && cd ../.. && cmake-js build -d 'implementations/cpp'
scripts.debug-build: cd implementations/typescript && npx tsc && cd ../.. && cmake-js build -d 'implementations/cpp' --debug
